description.all: I'm a junior full stack developer with a year of experience using Vue.js and Django Rest Framework to build awesome, reliable, responsive, automated, attractive Single Page Applications. Just forget about old reloading web sites. See further in my {projects} or check out my {resume}.

wid.tagline: I have experience with the web for a year building personal projects. Here's the quick overview of what I use to build cool web apps.
wid.title: What I do

blog.subtitle: Welcome to my blog. Subscribe and get my latest blog posts in your inbox.
blog.title: A Blog About Software Development And Life

contact.subtitle1: Interested in hiring me for your project or just want to say hi? You can fill in the contact form below or send me an email to {email}.
contact.subtitle2: Want to get connected? Follow me on the social channels below.

faqs.description: You can get answers for most asked questions below.

header.overview: Always ready to change the world to a better side.

projects.description: Welcome to my online portfolio. I'm taking on freelance work at the moment. Want some help building your software?

resume.description: Firstly I was motivated by thinking that programming is an art. I started learning Python in 2019. I used Python to build little programs in order to make my mind run into programming basics. Nowadays I'm using JavaScript as my main language. I have an ability to learn new skills in IT sphere. Searching skills to make what's in purpose. Good at communication. Always online.
resume.title: Online Resume

basic.details: Production of Websites that are mainly focused on Front-End Development. The design must be provided by the client.
basic.title: Basic

premium.details: A complex web application for businesses. Everything is dynamic including Backend, Frontend. Aimed to succeed in the job.
premium.title: Premium

standard.details: The medium-sized web-app. Static Backend, Frontend, Custom design are provided by the developer.
standard.title: Standard

backend.description: Static Backend with data saving and authentication with Django.
backend.title: Backend

backendApi.description: Backend that is based on API's - more fast and modern than Static Backend.
backendApi.title: API-based Backend

dynamicFrontend.description: No reloading anymore. Pages are fast and user friendly.
dynamicFrontend.title: Dynamic Frontend (Vue.js)

frontend.description: Conversion of your PSD or Figma layouts (designs) to frontend code.
frontend.title: Frontend

services.subtitle1: I have a year of personal experience building softwares for the web. You can take a look at my {projects} and {resume} to find out more about my skills and experiences.
services.subtitle2: I'm currently taking on freelance software development work. You're welcome to contact me for a custom quote for your project. I also offer development service packages with fixed pricing.
